name: Planetoid (itch) (eaur)
description:
Core features:

  • Six levels with the beginnings of a plot.
  • 2D game-world with 3D graphics.
  • Orbital mechanics based on real Newtonian physics.
  • Orbital gunplay: Fire your cannons. Dodge the enemy missiles.

This is the first attempt at a game by a hobby developer. 

Feedback and ideas are welcome :)
